about_the_game:
In TerraStorm's alternative timeline, the War has ended over 70 years ago with the discovery of Viribus. The mysterious resource, uncovered by the Nazis, was used to wipe the planet of most of the humankind. Nowadays, however, it's being used as a perfect power source for those who miraculously survived, and congregated in the Capitol. ROSE Corp., responsible for the Capitol's wellbeing, decided to found Project Towers as a solution for growing numbers of refugees, storming the city's gates. Your role, as one of the project's Architects, is to find a suitable place and start new settlements - self-sufficient towers - to become the humankind's new bastions.

Venture out. Explore. Build. Save tomorrow.



FEATURES
  • Discover the alternative timeline of well-known Second World War history
  • Build and manage every aspect of the Tower, where each floor is as big as few small cities. As you progress in game, you'll be responsible for more then one Tower. They can have diversified purposes, so you'll need to plan exchanging resources between all of them
  • Research and rediscover technologies, that will let you make the Tower self-sufficent
  • Tackle difficult moral decisions where it’s up to you which one is good or bad. The consequences will be yours as well

  • Explore the post apocalyptic wasteland in search of separated communities and old world's artifacts
  • Cooperate with other Architects and Capitol to secure the mankind’s future
  • Find the purpose and light the way for society, to Save Tomorrow

short_description: TerraStorm is a survival city builder set 70 years after the apocalyptic ending of the Second World War. You will be an Architect, responsible for finding a suitable place to start new settlements, self-sufficient Towers, that will become humankind's new bastions.
